title: Create A Happy Life Now: Fast, Sustainable and Powerful
description: Why do we seem to be unable to live a happy life and what can we do to change this? In her book Create A Happy Life, Marilyn Holzmann answers these questions, explains in detail why we live and feel a certain way, and most importantly, teaches us how we can escape the vicious circle of drama and despair. In an easy, clear and precise manner, Marilyn gives step-by-step instructions on how to achieve consistent happiness in our lives. She leaves out lofty theories and complex spiritual concepts and gets straight to the heart of the matter in a way which any person can easily comprehend and apply in their own lives. The 28-Days-Challenge which Marilyn includes in her book gives the reader a highly practical framework to follow and obtain fast results. This book is a must read for anyone who wishes to add quality to their lives!
author: Marilyn Holzmann
